abstract.p: Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt acquires Mediphacs Inc, an advertising agency specializing in health care education services; financial terms undisclosed (S)

block.p: Bozell, Jacobs, Kenyon & Eckhardt, which owns agencies including Bozell Worldwide, said yesterday that it had acquired Mediphacs Inc. in Somerset, N.J., an agency specializing in health care education services. Terms were not disclosed.

Bozell, Jacobs will combine Mediphacs with Healthmark/ATG in Fort Lee, N.J., a health care agency, to form Mediaphacs-Healthmark, with more than 40 employees and combined billings estimated at $25 million from clients like SmithKline Beecham Pharmaceuticals and Sanofi Pharmaceuticals. Christine B. Lewis, 51, president of Mediphacs, will be president and chief executive of Mediaphacs-Healthmark, which will be a unit of Bozell Wellness Worldwide, the Bozell, Jacobs health care marketing network.
